citeinfo.origin: Alessandro Cantelli, Wesley Lauer, Jeff Marr, Brandon McElroy, Gary Parker
citeinfo.title: Stream restoration toolbox

pubinfo.publish: National Center for Earth-surface Dynamics Data Repository

descript.abstract: The Stream Restoration Toolbox consists of current basic research cast into the form of tools that can be used by practitioners. The toolbox contains models, code, websites, and small applications that are useful for applied stream restoration Tools are free to download and use. The Toolbox is not limited to NCED but is open to all contributors. Tools are listed in alphabetical order: Bank Stabilization Diagnosis, The Dam Remover: Mark I, The Gravel River Bankfull Channel Estimator, The Gravel River Bankfull Discharge Estimator, Planform Statistics, Sand Bed Calculator, Spawning Habitat Integrated Rehabilitation Approach (SHIRA), The Spawning Gravel Refresher, The Threshold Channel Calculator. Also includes the ebook, 1D Sediment Transport Morphodynamics with applications to: Rivers and Turbidity Currents.
